title: Let us know who's coming
content1: Please fill in your names to register your attendance.
content2: The base menu will already include a variety of vegetarian, fish and meat options. A special kids menu is planned for those invited below 12 years old.
errorMessage: Something went wrong, please try again later...
updateMessage: Your response has been updated, thank you for letting us know.
savedMessageAccept: Your response has been saved, thank you for letting us know. We're looking forward to celebrate with you!
savedMessageDecline: Your response has been saved, thank you for letting us know.
